this_title: Isis Rising: Curse of the Lady Mummy
introduction: In ancient Egypt, Isis and Osiris ruled the land. All were happy for the couple except one, Set, a jealous man who killed Osiris in order to take over his kingdom. Isis snuck into Osiris' tomb and tried to raise him from the dead using her black magic. Set caught Isis in the act and had Osiris cut to pieces, with each piece buried in a different part of the land, so Isis could ...
foreign_title: Isis Rising: Curse of the Lady Mummy
